Mosaic.name: sizing
Mosaic.description: Sets the minimum width each child item divided up into, out of the space available.

Mosaic.name: alignment
Mosaic.description: Adjusts where the child items will be placed within the Mosaic along both axis.

Mosaic.name: alignment_x
Mosaic.description: Adjusts where the child items will be placed within the Mosaic along the horizontal axis.

Mosaic.name: alignment_y
Mosaic.description: Adjusts where the child items will be placed within the Mosaic along the vertical axis.

Mosaic.name: spacing
Mosaic.description: Adjusts the visual spacing between child items in the Mosaic.

Mosaic.name: spacing_x
Mosaic.description: Adjusts the horizontal visual spacing between child items in the Mosaic.

Mosaic.name: spacing_y
Mosaic.description: Adjusts the vertical visual spacing between child items in the Mosaic.

Mosaic

Mosaic is a layout primitive for setting up a mosaic of items organized to displaying as many child items at a certain size as possible.

Imports

<script>
    import {Mosaic} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Sizing

NOTE: By passing an array, you can set responsive values. e.g. sizing={["tiny", "tablet:medium", "mobile:medium"]}

You can alter how large each Mosaic item should be via the sizing property.

Spacing

NOTE: By passing an array, you can set responsive values. e.g. spacing={["medium", "tablet:small", "mobile:tiny"]}

You can adjust the spacing between items via the spacing, spacing_x, and spacing_y properties.
